issues.issueMessage:
Field description: Used to specify the locations and relevant attributes of all source datasets.
Valid keys in each object include `"URL"`, `"DOI"` (see
[URI](SPEC_ROOT/common-principles.md#uniform-resource-indicator)), and
`"Version"` with
[string](https://www.w3schools.com/js/js_json_datatypes.asp)
values.
